text: Loretta Elizabeth Lynch (born May 21, 1959) is an American politician. She was the 83rd Attorney General of the United States from April 27, 2015 to January 20, 2017. Before, she served as United States Attorney for the Eastern District of New York from 1999 through 2001 and again from 2010 through 2015. Lynch was nominated by President Barack Obama on November 8, 2014. Her appointment was confirmed on April 23, 2015 by a 56 to 43 vote."Loretta Lynch confirmed by Senate as attorney general". Her nomination process was one of the longest in the history of the United States, taking 166 days after she was first nominated for the post. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:United States Attorneys General Category:African-American lawyers Category:African-American politicians Category:Politicians from Greensboro, North Carolina Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Greensboro, North Carolina Category:Lawyers from New York City
title: Loretta Lynch
